resources.string: StressAway is a product that enhances the mood of a person by recommending stress relief ways based on the journal written by the person. The product analyzes the journal , understands the mood of a person and recommends different kinds of music , movies, books, exercises, food and also the places around the userâ€™s location that boosts his/her mood.
To get into all universities to help students to balance their mental health.
